text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh! Outta the way! Move!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Eeeek!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun comes running<n>straight at me, but I
somehow manage<n>to safely stop her.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Sorry about that. Andthanks for catching me.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I guess this isn't the first time<n>this has happened.

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
You get back here right this instant,<n>Mayano! For the last
time, I'm telling<n>you to turn in your homework today!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Whoops. Now isn't the time to talk!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I gotta scramble outta here!<n>Catch you later!

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Oh, she can be such a handful! She's<n>too quick for her own
good. I'm sorry,<n>but could you give her a talking-to as<n>
well?

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
She needs to submit her homework,<n>unless she wants
detention eating into<n>her training time!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I hurriedly search for my<n>troublemaking trainee, only to find
her<n>hiding under my desk in the trainers'<n>office.
choice_data_list: So this is where you went, Mayano.
So this is where you went, Mayano.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh—oh wait, it's just you. I don't<n>mind being found by
you! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Where'd my teacher go? She isn'there, right? Phew... I thought I wasdone for!
choice_data_list: Have you not been doing your homework?
Have you not been doing your homework?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It's no fair! She gives me extra<n>homework just 'cause I fall
asleep<n>during class!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I only slept while we were reviewing<n>yesterday's stuff!
Besides, I can just<n>figure it all out if I read the textbook!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
She also tells me to "show my work"<n>or whatever on our
tests, but who<n>cares as long as the answer's right?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Why does she keep picking on me?!
choice_data_list:
If you don't do your homework, you'll be doing
math detention instead of training.

If you don't do your homework, you'll be doing
math detention instead of training.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh! I totally forgot about that!<n>Detention makes me lose
out on<n>training!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Urk. I didn't care much about training<n>before, but now...
Argh!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Why does this have to happenafter I decide to start training withyou?! All I wanted was to become atwinkly grown-up...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hrmmm... But I don't wanna do<n>homework... Blegh...
choice_data_list: Who knows? You may discover something new.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Something new?
choice_data_list:
Like what happened with training. There was a
point to that, remember?

Like what happened with training. There was a
point to that, remember?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: That's different... I think... Okay,<n>maybe not, but...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: A new discovery, huh? Hrm...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: All I can think of is how boring it'd be!<n>But like...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
If you're saying that it'd help, I<n>guess it wouldn't hurt to
try...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But! If I do this, I'm going to need<n>something in return. Like
another date!<n>♪ And it has to be something<n>grown-ups do!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Got it?! You got it, right?! Yaaay!<n>Where should we go this
time?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun hums happily to<n>herself as she finishes
her homework.
